result.execSummary:
The defendant Dale H. DECKER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law, on count 1 only.  Medical release is allowed.

records.addlTxt:
Order on Petition for Early Discharge from Probation.
The petition is granted.  The period of probation is modified to discharge the defendant from probation supervision on 06-29-17.
Cover letter.
Plea date set for 01/08/2016, at 2:30 p.m.

The parties jointly request a brief adjournment of this matter.
Plea date is set for 11-24-15 at 9:30 a.m.
Minutes.

DA asks for an adjourned plea date.   
Plea date reset to 10-21-15 at 10:00 a.m.   
Minutes.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 05-19-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Plea date is set for 08-06-15 at 9:00 a.m.   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.
Minutes.

Defendnat demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 04-09-15 at 10:00 a.m.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Dale H. DECKER
Current: 2012 Roosevelt Avenue, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States  (Effective: 03-03-2015)
Prior: 2102 Roosevelt Avenue, Two Rivers, WI 54241

Defendant in custody on arrest warrant. 
The matter is continued for initial appearance on 03-09-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours of release.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Arrest warrant with service of officer thereon.
